channel.title: Solved! (leaving for further help)
channel.description:
Okay, Guys I Am Connected To My VPS Right Now And I Set The IP to The VPS IP Adress And Compiled.... Now, When I Try To Run The Server It Says: [code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] What Do I Do To Get To Run My Server??
Compiler: [code]@echo off title Abandoned Dreams Compiler! "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java src\server\model\players\Quests\*.java src\server\model\players\Content\*.java pause[/code] Run: [code]@echo off title Abandoned Dreams (RUN) java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/code] THIS IS A HELPING COMMUNITY! THIS IS THE LAST THING BEFORE MY SERVER IS ONLINE! HOW THE FUCK DO I FIX THIS!?

item.title: Solved! (leaving for further help)
item.dc:creator: @ilegalpvp ilegalpvp
item.description:
@ilegalpvp wrote:

[quote=“rash, post:23, topic:376359”][quote author=ilegalpvp link=topic=472295.msg3454125#msg3454125 date=1293938308]

“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe”

Where Do I Put That?

put it where the 21 is
like this
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac.exe”

if that failz try:

“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac.exe”

if that failz try:

“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\javac.exe”

[/quote]

fails*[/quote]

hmm… its something else then… probably the vps

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote author=rash link=topic=472295.msg3454103#msg3454103 date=1293937599]

it wouldn’t matter. either he didn’t set his classpath/path environment or didn’t download the JDK (assuming OP is using a windows OS).
[/quote]How Do I Tell What Type Of Computer It Is?

It is windows?
[/quote]OMFG Dude, You Don’t Know That Nither Do I… Its My VPS Computer I Am Having This Problem On How Do I Tell What Type Of Computer It Is…?

lol.

Okay.

When you were signing up for it, did you go into windows vps or linux vps?
[/quote]http://vpsland.com/window_vps_plans.php :)[/quote]

Well, its a windows 64bit

item.title: Solved! (leaving for further help)
item.dc:creator: @Abandoned_Dreams Abandoned Dreams
item.description:
@Abandoned_Dreams wrote:

Okay, Guys I Am Connected To My VPS Right Now And I Set The IP to The VPS IP Adress And Compiled… Now, When I Try To Run The Server It Says:

'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
What Do I Do To Get To Run My Server??

Compiler:

@echo off title Abandoned Dreams Compiler! "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java src\server\model\players\Quests\*.java src\server\model\players\Content\*.java pause
Run:

@echo off title Abandoned Dreams (RUN) java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause THIS IS A HELPING COMMUNITY! THIS IS THE LAST THING BEFORE MY SERVER IS ONLINE! HOW THE FUCK DO I FIX THIS!?

Read full topic
